attributes.action: Housing for ex veterans and not refugees in East Cambridgeshire
attributes.background:
There are just over 9,000 ex-service personnel who are homeless and need help. Those who served for Queen and country and for many suffering with PTSD Priorities should be put first to them not Syrian refugees.

Those old MOD buildings should be used for those ex service personnel.

rejection.details:
Housing in East Cambridgeshire is the responsibility of East Cambridgeshire district council.

You can find out more about how to petition the council here:

http://www.eastcambs.gov.uk/council-and-democracy/petitions

You could also contact local councillors about this. You can use this page to find out who the local councillors are and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
